SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER u ON u.username=t.worker LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_INFO p ON p.id=t.project_id WHERE t.valid=1 AND (SELECT R.DEPTID FROM BG_SYS_USER_DEPT_RELATION R WHERE R.USERID = u.userid AND trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN R.EXP_START_TIME AND R.EXP_END_TIME AND ((R.SRC = 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT R1.USERID FROM BG_SYS_USER_DEPT_RELATION R1 WHERE R1.USERID = R.USERID AND trunc(sysdate) BETWEEN R1.EXP_START_TIME AND R1.EXP_END_TIME AND R1.VALID = 1 AND R1.SRC = 1)) OR R.SRC IN (1, 2)) AND R.VALID = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) IN (${deptIds})
AND t.work_time >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND t.work_time <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND DECODE(t.category,'NP',t.category,p.category) = #{category}
AND DECODE(t.category, 'NP', t.project_name, p.project_name) LIKE '%'||#{proName}||'%'
AND u.useralias LIKE '%'||#{empName}||'%'
AND t.status=#{status}

SELECT t.id, TO_CHAR(t.work_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') as work_time, DECODE(t.category, 'NP', t.project_name, p.project_name) as project_name, DECODE(t.category, 'NP', '非项目工作', (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='category100002' and vaild=1 and code=p.category)) as category, t.job_content, t.working_hour, t.APPROVER as approver, r.useralias as empname, r.hrcode as hrcode, p.wbs_number FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_INFO p ON p.id=t.project_id AND p.status='1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER r ON r.username=t.worker WHERE t.id =#{id} AND t.valid=1

SELECT TO_CHAR(t.work_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as work_time, (SELECT deptname FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE deptid = t.dept_id) as dept, (SELECT deptname FROM BG_SYS_DEPT WHERE deptid = t.lab_id) as lab, r.useralias as username, r.hrcode as hrcode, (SELECT name FROM BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY WHERE pcode='category100002' and vaild=1 and code=NVL(p.category,t.category)) as category, NVL(p.project_name,t.project_name) as project_name, t.job_content, t.working_hour, t.APPROVER as approver_username, f.useralias as approver, t.status FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t LEFT JOIN BG_PROJECT_INFO p ON p.id=t.project_id and p.status='1' LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER r ON r.username=t.worker LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_USER f ON f.username=t.approver WHERE t.id =#{id} AND t.valid=1

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(DECODE(tws.schedule_type, 0, DECODE(SIGN(tws.today_hours - 8), 1, (tws.today_hours - 8), 0), 1, tws.today_hours)),0) FROM (SELECT wh.*, ws.schedule_type FROM (SELECT t.work_time, SUM(t.working_hour) as today_hours FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t WHERE t.worker = #{username} AND t.valid=1 AND t.status='1'
AND t.work_time >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.work_time <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.work_time <> TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY t.work_time) wh JOIN BG_SYS_WORK_SCHEDULE ws ON wh.work_time = ws.schedule_date) tws

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(t.working_hour),0) today_submit_workhour FROM BG_WORKINGHOUR_INFO t WHERE t.worker = #{username} AND t.valid=1 AND t.status IN ('1','3') AND t.work_time = TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT bws.schedule_type FROM BG_SYS_WORK_SCHEDULE bws WHERE bws.schedule_date = TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
